review: Love this, it works better than I had hoped. It buffers some in the middle of a show but that could be my internet too. 😕 other than that I highly recommend!!
author: Mindy

review: Awesome! I love my Amazon FireTV Stick.
author: staci

review: This was very hard to set up because the language was all in German and I had to toggle through a German dictionary to find the settings to set up in English.....the online help on this subject was worthless... Now I think we will like it once we get used to the navigation....
author: ka

review: What a great way to watch my Prime shows!  Works perfectly and I am loving it!
author: Zsabell "crazy cat lady"

review: My remote control doesn't work at all. Gives me the home page an that is it. Then go in screen saver.
author: Carlos Ahumada

review: Very easy to install and easy to connect. We have a get away cabin and can't wait to try it there
author: William Tackes

review: Great Quality Product. Make the purchase, You'll be so glad you did:-)My only regret is that I didn't get it sooner...With a name like Amazon, they'll never last ;-)Keep up the good work guys.

review: just what I ordered and works great! came highly recommended from a friend!

review: Great product, still exploring it, but so far meets my expectations.  Mirroring my laptop to it took several attempts, but otherwise no complaints.
